quote: I'm sure my parents must be proud. Or horrified. Or are bitterly arguing about whether they're proud or horrified, and have already hired lawyers to resolve the dispute. -Hayden Upchurch
quote_letters: IM SURE MY PARENTS MUST BE PROUD OR HORRIFIED OR ARE BITTERLY ARGUING ABOUT WHETHER THEYRE PROUD OR HORRIFIED AND HAVE ALREADY HIRED LAWYERS TO RESOLVE THE DISPUTE -HAYDEN UPCHURCH
